00035 const struct simInterface beep_interface;
00036 
00037 // COOJA variables
00038 char simBeeped;
00039 
00040 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 void
00042 beep_alarm(int alarmmode, int len)
00043 {
00044   simBeeped = 1;
00045 }

00050   simBeeped = 1;
00051 }

00056   simBeeped = 1;
00057 }

00062   simBeeped = 1;
00063 }
